item.description:
Wallyball is volleyball played in a racquetball court.  The walls of the court are part of the play.

The game provides for both a great workout (sweating is NOT optional) and a whole lot of laughs. If you enjoy playing volleyball, you will most likely enjoy this version of it as well. It is a great team sport!

We try to hold a game every Thursday evening at Seacoast Sports Club. We need a minimum of six players to hold a game. 

Wallyball is free for Seacoast Sports Club members,

$7 for non-members, payable at the desk. The $7 fee entitles you to full use of the locker rooms, saunas, steam rooms, etc. for the evening, too.

RSVP EARLY in the week!!  Courts have to be reserved and games will be cancelled if a minimum # of players has not signed up.  (No-shows will also be severely punished by Sheila!)

ALWAYS CHECK THE MEETUP SITE for cancelled games before showing up.  With illnesses and weather, the game may have to be cancelled. .
item.name: Wallyball 11/10/11
